## Key commands

* cd #followed by folder# enters folder
* cd.. goes back
* ls shows what is in current folder

## general notes

Working directory link: /mnt/c/Users/varun/Documents

```{bash}

cd /mnt/c/Users/varun/Documents 

#will take you to working director

```

# Setting up github on laptop
###### Source:*https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/wsl/tutorials/wsl-git*

```{bash}

git config --global user.name "Your Name"

git config --global user.name "Varun Venkatesh"

git config --global user.email "youremail@domain.com"

git config --global user.email "varun.venkatesh@gmail.com"



```
